page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: The Barkham area is undulating.It is mainly fields with residential areas round California and Barkham Ride in the south and Bearwood road in the north.There are a lot of farms scattered about.There is an old church at Barkham and a farm next to it called Church Farm which has a moat round it.There is a Guide Dog Centre at Folly Court where dogs are trained to help blind people.A line of electricity pylons runs across the area to an electricity substation. There is a lake called Longmoor Lake which is part of California Country Park with a holiday camp with mobile homes next to it.By Gorse Ride School there is a community centre which has a large hall and a field used for general recreation. Barkham Ride and Nashgrove Ride are old rides that used to run through the Windsor Great Park.
